summary: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.
cast: Suriya|Tamannaah Bhatia|Prabhu|Jagan|Akashdeep Saigal|Karunas|Ponvannan|Renuka|Delhi Ganesh|Kalairani|Janaki Sabesh|Subela Sudhakar|Rajendranath|Rail Ravi|Koena Mitra|Lucas Ogunro
title: Ayan
